Steam Greenlight

help us getting greenlit!

15 jan. 2015

Happy new year!

Let’s start with a great new for Pixelnest: Steredenn has been submitted on Steam Greenlight!

Our main focus is still the Xbox One, but we don’t want to forget PC players.

If you like Steredenn — we sure hope so —, help us getting greenlit!

Thanks for your support. :)

15 january. 2015
